      public void clearTable​(String tableString, long timestamp) throws IOException

    • getEstimatedRegionServerCount

      public int getEstimatedRegionServerCount()
      从接口复制的说明: AdminMask
      Estimate the number of regionservers in the HBase cluster. This is usually implemented by calling Admin.getClusterStatus() and then ClusterStatus.getServers() and finally size() on the returned server list.
      指定者:
      getEstimatedRegionServerCount 在接口中 AdminMask
      返回:
      the number of servers in the cluster or -1 if it could not be determined
